name: Ascendant Spirit
oracle_text:
{S}{S}: Ascendant Spirit becomes a Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 2/3.
{S}{S}{S}: If Ascendant Spirit is a Warrior, put a flying counter on it and it becomes a Spirit Warrior angel with base power and toughness 4/4.
{S}{S}{S}{S}: If Ascendant Spirit is an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it gains "Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, draw a card."

name: Skemfar Avenger
oracle_text: Whenever another nontoken Elf or Berserker you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: Stripped of their divinity, the elves of Skemfar channeled their rage and sorrow into bloody brutality.

name: Strategic Planning
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: Alrund sees the future as a whorl of signs and symbols, omens interwoven in a intricate knotwork only he can decipher.

name: Poison the Cup
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature. If this spell was foretold, scry 2.
Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: Dark schemes cut down what armies cannot.

name: Usher of the Fallen
oracle_text: Boast — {1}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Human Warrior creature token. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)
flavor_text: "I have led ten thousand through these mists and never lost the way."

name: Revitalize
oracle_text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Erika alone knows how to distill the essence of the World Tree into the Cosmos Elixir, a magical substance which grants the Skoti god-family immortality.

name: Narfi, Betrayer King

name: Clarion Spirit
oracle_text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: To the living, the horn sounds faint and mournful, but to the spirits of Istfell, it is a thunderous call that must be obeyed.

name: Aegar, the Freezing Flame
